text: The Trondheim Region is a statistical metropolitan area in the counties of Sør-Trøndelag (population: 223,363) and Nord-Trøndelag (23,388) in Norway. It is centered around the city of Trondheim. Municipality Population Area¹ Density² County Trondheim 158,613 322 493 Sør-Trøndelag Melhus 14,176 655 22 Sør-Trøndelag Malvik 12,213 162 75 Sør-Trøndelag Rissa 6,417 588 11 Sør-Trøndelag Skaun 6,146 213 29 Sør-Trøndelag Midtre Gauldal 5,873 1,807 3 Sør-Trøndelag Orkdal 10,632 594 18 Sør-Trøndelag Klæbu 5,353 175 31 Sør-Trøndelag Selbu 3,940 1,141 3 Sør-Trøndelag Stjørdal 19,892 913 27 Nord-Trøndelag Leksvik 3,496 400 9 Nord-Trøndelag Total 246,751 6,970 35 As of 2006 1/ km² 2/ Population per km², population data from ssb ; 3/ Orkdal has been added to region due to new road completed Category:Trondheim
title: Trondheim Region
